includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Gordon searches for justice away from the Gotham City PD, while Cobblepot faces off against a new rival and Bruce closes in on the truth. Second season of hit comic book action starring Ben McKenzie.

includedIn.title: Gotham
includedIn.synopsis: Rookie detective James Gordon is partnered with veteran Harvey Bullock to investigate the brutal murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne which had one witness, their young son Bruce.
